title.narrative: Rural Eye Health Programme - Uttar Pradesh

description.narrative: To improve eye health for rural poor and other vulnerable groups through improved health services and systems.

participating-org.narrative: Indira Gandhi Eye Hospital & Research Centre (IGEHRC)
